Title: A Disquieting Feeling
Description:
Ah, $n! You're just the person I was looking for. I'm a little concerned about Khadgar. I don't think it's anything dire, but he doesn't seem to be enjoying himself like everyone else--he just seems... distracted. 

I don't want to pry, but perhaps you could bring him a drink for me? He may open up to you.
